paragraphs.title: Download and unpack MovieLens archive
paragraphs.text:
%sh

# if [[ -d /tmp/ml-latest ]]; then
#     rm -fr /tmp/ml-latest
#     echo "Removed existing /tmp/ml-latest folder..."
# fi

wget -q -O /tmp/ml-latest.zip http://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-latest.zip 
echo "Dowloaded ml-latest.zip ..."

unzip /tmp/ml-latest.zip -d /tmp/
rm /tmp/ml-latest.zip
echo "Unpacked ml-latest.zip ..."

dir0=/tmp/datalake
dir1=links
dir2=movies
dir3=ratings
dir4=tags

for dir in $dir1 $dir2 $dir3 $dir4;do
    # if [[ -d $dir0/$dir ]];then
    #   rm -r $dir0/$dir
    # fi
    
    mkdir -p $dir0/$dir

    mv /tmp/ml-latest/$dir.csv $dir0/$dir/
    echo "Moved $dir.csv to $dir0/$dir/ ..."
done

rm -r /tmp/ml-latest
echo "Datalake files created!"

msg.data:
Dowloaded ml-latest.zip ...
Archive:  /tmp/ml-latest.zip
   creating: /tmp/ml-latest/
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/links.csv  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/tags.csv  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/genome-tags.csv  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/ratings.csv  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/README.txt  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/genome-scores.csv  
  inflating: /tmp/ml-latest/movies.csv  
Unpacked ml-latest.zip ...
Moved links.csv to /tmp/datalake/links/ ...
Moved movies.csv to /tmp/datalake/movies/ ...
Moved ratings.csv to /tmp/datalake/ratings/ ...
Moved tags.csv to /tmp/datalake/tags/ ...
Datalake files created!

paragraphs.text:
%sh

# ls -l /tmp/datalake/movies

# create an hdfs folder and copy movies.csv files in there

hdfs dfs -mkdir -p /datalake/movies
hdfs dfs -put -f /tmp/datalake/movies/movies.csv /datalake/movies

%pyspark

rdd = sc.textFile("hdfs:///datalake/movies/movies.csv")
# rdd.count

%pyspark

line = rdd.take(2)[1]
line

%pyspark

import re

# test extract

re.split('(\d+),\"?(.+)\((\d{4})\)[ ]*\"?,(.+)', line)

%pyspark

rdd_normalized = rdd.map(normalize_line).filter(lambda r: r[0] != None and r[1] != None and r[2] != None)

rdd_normalized.take(10)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

rdd_filtered = rdd_normalized.filter( \
      lambda r: bool(re.search('love', r[0], re.IGNORECASE)) and (2000 <= r[1] <= 2005) and (set({'Drama', 'Comedy'}) & set(r[2]) != set()))

rdd_filtered.take(5)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import subprocess
# import json

def run_cmd(args_list):
    """
    run linux commands
    """
    
    # print('Running system command: {0}'.format(' '.join(args_list)))
    proc = subprocess.Popen(args_list, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
    s_output, s_err = proc.communicate()
    s_return =  proc.returncode
    
    return s_return, s_output.decode('UTF-8'), s_err.decode('UTF-8')

%pyspark

(ret, out, err)= run_cmd(['hdfs', 'dfs', '-rm', '-r', '-f', '/tmp/movies/map-filter'])
print(out, err)

%pyspark
